data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The Orphic religion, which taught reincarnation, about the 6th century BC, organized itself into mystery schools at Eleusis and elsewhere, and produced a copious literature. Orpheus, its ____ founder, is ____ to ____ taught ____ the ____ soul ____ to ____ while ____ body ____ it ____. The ____ of ____ revolves, the ____ alternates ____ freedom ____ captivity ____ the ____ circle ____ necessity. Orpheus, its lege_____ founder, is sa__ to ha__ taught th__ the immo____ soul asp____ to fre____ while t__ body ho___ it pris____. The wh___ of bi___ revolves, the so__ alternates bet____ freedom a__ captivity ro___ the wi__ circle o_ necessity. data.fullContent: The Orphic religion, which taught reincarnation, about the 6th century BC, organized itself into mystery schools at Eleusis and elsewhere, and produced a copious literature. Orpheus, its legendary founder, is said to have taught that the immortal soul aspires to freedom while the body holds it prisoner. The wheel of birth revolves, the soul alternates between freedom and captivity round the wide circle of necessity. Orpheus proclaimed the need of the grace of the gods, Dionysus in particular, and of self-purification until the soul has completed the spiral ascent of destiny to live for ever.
data.answer: 俄耳甫斯教，教导转世，大约在公元前6世纪，在埃利乌西斯和其他地方组织自己的神秘学校，并产生了丰富的文献。传说中的俄耳甫斯是它的创始人，据说他曾教导人们不朽的灵魂渴望自由，而身体却囚禁着灵魂。生命之轮是转动的，灵魂在自由和囚禁之间交替，围绕着广阔的必然圈。俄耳甫斯宣称需要诸神的恩典，尤其是酒神狄俄尼索斯，需要自我净化，直到灵魂完成了永生的螺旋上升。
